set.name: DMSD-16 King Master Start Deck: Zero Jr.'s Mugen Climb

property.name: Race
property.value: Infinite Dragon/Team Zero

property.name: Rules
property.value: {MUGEN CLIMB} Water/Darkness 4(You may summon this creature from your hand or graveyard by tapping 4 of your creatures and paying Water/Darkness 4.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose up to 3 of your opponent's creatures and return them to their owner's hand. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, your opponent discards 3 cards at random from their hand.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: King Master Card

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-16 King Master Start Deck: Zero Jr.'s Mugen Climb

property.name: Race
property.value: Mafi Gang/Team Zero

property.name: Rules
property.value: {MUGEN CLIMB} Water 2(You may summon this creature from your hand or graveyard by tapping 2 of your creatures and paying Water 2.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw a card, then discard a card.

Then your opponent discards a card at random from their hand.

Then put a creature that costs 3 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.value: {MUGEN CLIMB} Water 2(You may summon this creature from your hand or graveyard by tapping 2 of your creatures and paying Water 2.) {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Whenever this creature taps, choose one of your opponent's creatures. property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, skip the rest of the turn.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-16 King Master Start Deck: Zero Jr.'s Mugen Climb

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Reveal one and put it into your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If a light or darkness card was revealed in this way, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.
